content: you can find the free version of this pattern on my blog here >>> https //www acraftyconcept com/crafty-boho-stocking/ or the full video tutorial here >> https //youtu be/inzhihfns6c the crafty boho stocking is designed to be sturdy enough to hold up throughout many years of use create a set of these for your family or for your customers and they will cherish their handmade stockings for years to come the pattern download also includes a printer-friendly version with no pictures sizes one size about 18 tall and 6 5 wide skill level beginner to intermediate terminology this pattern is written in standard us crochet terms in english only materials with affiliate links size h 5 0mm crochet hook https //amzn to/2n83wdy 4-5oz of worsted weight yarn i use hobby lobby s i love this yarn 1 skein of faux fur yarn tapestry needle https //amzn to/2nej5yf scissors https //amzn to/30cntwk pattern copyright please do not copy redistribute or sell my pattern in any way you are more than welcome to sell your finished piece i hope they are a very hot item for you you may not use my pictures and pass them off as your own for they are my property thank you for your understanding
